description:
Chogoro Kitsunebi sends a message announcing his next crime! His target is the golden deep-fried tofu statue on display at the Oedo Art Museum. The police are determined to stop the crime to maintain the dignity of the magistrate. “Kitsunebi has become just another burglar. I`ll catch him myself,” Kozenigata says. Kozenigata, who has been chasing Kitsunebi for over ten years, goes to the scene of the crime along with the Odd Jobs trio, despite the fact that he`s on house arrest. Gintoki and the others try to force their way into the heavily guarded art museum. But at that moment, Kitsunebi appears and throws everything into confusion…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hart gekochte Eier werden tausend Jahre alt!
